from sys import stdin,stdout
from math import pow,sqrt
import math
def dist(x1,y1,x2,y2):
	return sqrt((y2-y1)*(y2-y1)+(x2-x1)*(x2-x1))
	
def eq(s1,s2):
	if(abs(s1-s2)<pow(10,-6)):
		return True
	else:
		return False

id=int(stdin.readline().strip())
t=int(stdin.readline().strip())
if id==1:
	for i in range(0,t):
		x1,y1,x2,y2,x3,y3=map(int,raw_input().split(' '))
		s1=dist(x1,y1,x2,y2)
		s2=dist(x2,y2,x3,y3)
		s3=dist(x3,y3,x1,y1)
		if(not(eq(s1,s2)) and not(eq(s2,s3)) and not(eq(s3,s1))):
			print "Scalene triangle"
		else:
			print "Isosceles triangle"
else:
	for i in range(0,t):
		x1,y1,x2,y2,x3,y3=map(int,raw_input().split(' '))
		s1=dist(x1,y1,x2,y2)
		s2=dist(x2,y2,x3,y3)
		s3=dist(x3,y3,x1,y1)
		if(not(eq(s1,s2)) and not(eq(s2,s3)) and not(eq(s3,s1))):
			print "Scalene",
		else:
			print "Isosceles",
		c=math.acos((s1*s1+s2*s2-s3*s3)/(2*s1*s2))
		b=math.acos((s1*s1+s3*s3-s2*s2)/(2*s1*s3))
		PI=math.asin(1)*2
		a=PI-b-c
		#print a,b,c,PI/2
		if(abs(a-PI/2)<pow(10,-6) or abs(b-PI/2)<pow(10,-6) or abs(c-PI/2)<pow(10,-6)):	
		#if PI/2 in [a,b,c]:
			print "right",
		elif(a<PI/2 and b<PI/2 and c<PI/2):
			print "acute",
		else:
			print "obtuse",
		print "triangle"
